mapper.insert: insert into t_role_apply( role_id, role_name, status, apply_staff_num, apply_staff_name, apply_account_name, apply_department_name, apply_time, modify_emp, modify_time ) values( #{roleId}, #{roleName}, #{applyStatus}, #{applyStaffNum}, #{applyStaffName}, #{applyAccountName}, #{applyDepartmentName}, now(), #{modifyStaffName}, now() )
mapper.select: select t3.id id, t3.account_name accountName, t4.staff_name staffName, t4.staff_num staffNum, t5.department_name department, t2.operation applyOperation from t_role_apply t1 left join t_apply_role_account t2 on t1.id=t2.apply_id left join t_account t3 on t2.account_id=t3.id left join t_staff t4 on t3.id=t4.account_id left join t_department t5 on t4.department_id=t5.id where t1.id=#{applyId}

select t1.account_name applyAccountName, t2.staff_num applyStaffNum, t2.staff_name applyStaffName, t3.department_name applyDepartmentName, t2.staff_name modifyStaffName from t_account t1 left join t_staff t2 on t1.id=t2.account_id left join t_department t3 on t2.department_id=t3.id where t1.account_name=#{applyAccountName}
mapper.insert: insert into t_apply_role_account( apply_id, role_id, account_id, operation, create_emp, create_time, modify_emp, modify_time ) values( #{applyId}, #{roleId}, #{accountId}, #{applyOperation}, #{createEmp}, now(), #{modifyEmp}, now() )
mapper.update: update t_role_apply set role_id=#{roleId}, role_name=#{roleName}, apply_time=now(), modify_time=now() where id=#{id}
